website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for a portable printing calculator small enough to take with you.
pros: The small printer and body make it easy to store the fully featured calculator in a bag or backpack
The screen shows up to 12 digits for larger numbers
cons: The printer can smudge the ink at times, resulting in illegible numbers and letters

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Best calculator ever. I have had one of these for ten years, but mine finally went bad. They last almost forever, and are still available, amazingly enough, so no learning curve when replacing mine! Also, the two-color ink wheels last a long time as well and replacements are still readily available. Recommended machine!
customer_reviews.author: Lovemonger1

customer_reviews.title: Review update.
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review on this calculator. Whether it is the "ink" roller problem or, the calculator problem, this was my 2nd Sharp printer that did the same thing. Would not print clear numbers on tape. I am an accountant and need to run tapes and this does not do the trick for me. I ended up with a Cannon with a spool for the ink and Love it! Canon MP11DX bought off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Trueblood

customer_reviews.title: Postivie #'s print wrongly in red
customer_reviews.text: This calculator often types positive numbers in red plus puts weird symbols at the ends of lines that make no sense. I have searched and searched for a way to correct this and nothing explains how to fix this. I am unable to use this machine. I would never never never buy this again. It is a horrible product. I have been using printing calculators for decades and this is the worst one I've ever had. I will see if it can be returned.
customer_reviews.author: katherine e

customer_reviews.title: 4.5/5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I work in medical billing, and calculate numbers all day long. This adding machine is easy to use, the buttons are a comfortable size, and the ink is really dark and easy to read. Great for an office, kinda loud for a home office. And make sure you go ahead and buy some receipt paper. I mean... the tiny roll that comes in the box is laughable, a joke, and almost insulting. But the paper is incredibly easy to load into the machine. I’d love to give it 4.5 stars, but I’ll give it 4.
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaT

customer_reviews.title: This sounded like exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This sounded like exactly what I needed. But the calculator was not in a factory box. In fact the only box was the shipping box. Then the ink cartridge was used since it didn't print very boldly on the paper as you would expect from a new cartridge. The black while faint you could read, but the red is very faint. Looks like they sent me a refurbished calculator at the new price. Of course it's going back. This seller should be ashamed of themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Motor burned
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this calculator in April and in June while using it the part where you add the paper just started spinning and I could not get it to stop. I unplugged it and started it again and it kept doing the same thing. It eventually just stopped working. Only 2 months of use and now I have to buy a new calculator.
customer_reviews.author: jadsoto

customer_reviews.title: This calculator is not for busy accountants
customer_reviews.text: Sharp has good products except this model. It is slow and it's not for fast calculations. This model I picked was the wrong model for my needs. I am a retired accountant and I have used different brands including Sharp. Just for laughs, you can take a nap and as you wake up it is still calculating. I could probably figure out the calculation in my mind before it gives me the answer. If you build one, in this day of age please produce a lightning fast calculator like other manufacturers do. I returned the product and bought a replacement for 4 bucks difference but it is fast. There you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Caro

customer_reviews.title: No battery option
customer_reviews.text: My last Sharp calculator lasted over 30 years & had both plug in & battery options. I never heard of a calculator didn't have both features until I took it out of the box. Very disappointing & worthless as I want to be tied to a cord in the middle of my dining room where I pay my bills on a cordless laptop. Wish I would have checked sooner as it is too late to return now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Definite Plus For Seniors
customer_reviews.text: A tad larger footprint than the prior unit I owned. Nice clear read out and tape visual is good. Really like the subtraction figure shown in red on tape, makes checking much easier. Keyboard is a wee larger than I am use to, my hands aren't that big but the larger sized keys are a plus for arthritic fingers. Now if it lasts as long as it should, I will be most grateful. Price is competitive & Amazon's Prime delivery is a definite Plus!
customer_reviews.author: MsJimmie

customer_reviews.title: Noisy !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The calculator sounds cheap and makes this annoying noise when printing. It is difficult to figure out when to put the figures and functions in to attain the correct answer.
customer_reviews.author: Kei B

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace an older model that is no longer in existence. This one is nice. The display is larger than what we had before, so that's a plus. They keys are slightly differently placed than the one we had before, but that's not a big deal either. The only SLIGHT con to this is that it makes a whirrrr whirrr whirrrr when you use it. It's not like the normal sound of the ink ribbon inside spinning and the paper moving up. It's just a little different - higher pitched whirrring. Other than that, it's pretty standard.
customer_reviews.author: yukicharley

customer_reviews.title: A Great Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: This model calculator has been available for years. We bought it to replace one just like it that we had for, near as we can figure, about 15 years. We only replaced it because it was just getting old, dirty and the display was getting dim. It has every function you need for home use, and my-husband-the-accountant likes it as much as I do. We like having a tape for those times when you really need one, so it meets all of our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Rules

customer_reviews.title: Adequate, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a calculator with a tape function. This device has that and the price is reasonable. That's the good news. The not-so-good news is: 1. The printing function is slow; the technology seems ancient; and, 2. It can be unnecessarily difficult to insert the tape. Purchasers will have to make sure that they have a tape supply on hand; the tape supplied with the machine is short. Still, for my purposes, the device is OK.
customer_reviews.author: dantebenedetti

customer_reviews.title: easy and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: bought this after the one in my office quit working. I was very picky because I use my calculator a LOT throughout the day. This one is easy to use, prints nicely, and has a large enough screen that I don't have to squint to read the numbers on the screen. Overall it is not a huge calculator which is how I wanted it because of lack of space on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finicky User
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who is a Finicky User... She loves it... Surprise... It has to work HER WAY and evidently this one does...
customer_reviews.author: Trants4md

customer_reviews.title: Terrible calculator
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst calculator ever. You have to play with it for hours to figure out how to use it. The = key does not give you a total and still cannot figure out how to subtract. Big mistake buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Linnane

customer_reviews.title: Sharp EL-1801V Calculator
customer_reviews.text: I owned the same make and model of this calculator and I really like how easy it is to use. I used the previous one for almost 6 years on a daily basis - A LOT (approx. 6-7 hours per day) and the print (even with new ink rollers was getting unreadable) and that is why I purchased another one just like it. The only thing I do not care for on the new one is it is noisier than the previous one, but otherwise I hope to get at least 6 years out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: "I Don't Like Change!"
customer_reviews.text: This is what my boss says all the time when he has to get something new. This product did NOT make him say that! It is a newer model of the same calculator he has been using for 25 years. His old one finally bit the dust. He told me to get him a new one, but he wanted the EXACT SAME ONE! So I did the best I could and he is super happy with it. It is even the same size as his old one.
customer_reviews.author: michelleh

customer_reviews.title: The Reliable brand we used to own.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. We owned one 15 years ago, but switch to a much smaller printer for 10 years until the prints become almost unreadable. I found this Sharp and reminded me of the old one we had so I purchased it. It looks like our old Sharp and works exactly the same. I recommended this unit very much.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo A. Seneris

customer_reviews.title: Choose something else-too slow
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Sharp for years that looked exactly like this one. That's why I chose it. The problem is, it can't keep up with me. If you have any speed at all using an adding machine, this isn't the one for you. I could add the same thing up five times and get a different total each time. Very frustrating......
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: PRINTS SLOW!! and it is loud. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: It did seem to work, but the printing was frustratingly slow and the machine is very loud. I plan to return it immediately. In the description, it is described as fast. Umm... NO.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Printing Calculator
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the Sharp Printing Calculators, one for home and one for my office. The price was right. They were delivered promptly as promised. They are easy to use, easy to read and are fairly compact. They fit nicely on a desk without taking up and excessive amount of space. They are also lightweight compared to my previous printing calculators.
customer_reviews.author: EileenC.

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine...I haven’t had to buy one in thirty years...the prices on these are outrageous...two to three times more than they used to be or for that matter than they should be. But whatcha gonna do that’s the way things are these day...oh well ...thank you for letting me vent😉😀
customer_reviews.author: rat****r

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this calculator for my home office. It is the same one that I use at my office. Love the comfortable use of this calculator. It does not take a video to show how to use. It can be used with a paper roll or without. I would recommend for either an office or home.
customer_reviews.author: Cecily K. Dano

customer_reviews.title: Time Saving and Money Saving
customer_reviews.text: Product packaging was impressive and arrived in a timely manner. Finger tip perfection and screen is easy to read. Can use with or with out print option. They do provide a "testing" amount of paper, so for those who want to get started with the paper print option, I suggest ordering the paper refill when you order the machine. Good product. Good Seller. Happy Customer
customer_reviews.author: ZCooper

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy!
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike this calculator. It is slow and very noisy! Also, it makes errors when I try to either go too fast or when trying to do multiple functions before totaling. I would not buy this model again. Anyone know of a quiet, fast printing calculator out there?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for desktop
customer_reviews.text: I've used so many calculators in my life that I knew what features I wanted. This calculator has all the features that I needed and didn't disappoint as far as convenience and ease of use. I use the paper (feed) function all the time as a double-check my calcs.
customer_reviews.author: eclectic eye

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice machine
customer_reviews.text: I would have given all 5 stars if I could adjust the settings to be a normal calculator. Had to watch some videos to figure out how to work it. Still annoyed I can't change the settings. I could change the settings to a normal calculator on my old machine.
customer_reviews.author: FurBabyMom

customer_reviews.title: Light, cheap feeling, and didn't work. Awful.
customer_reviews.text: Returned this and bought a real calculator. Very lightweight, and if you are really fast at 10KBT this machine will drive you insane. Printer is slow, mine refused to advance the paper when inserted. Horrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Delamotte

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy Sharp, as expected. Seems to have more functions than some of the ones I looked at in a local office supply store. The keys have a very nice feel. A great buy for the money. You will need to buy a few rolls of paper, as the tiny roll that comes with it is more for trying the adding machine out, rather than doing a years worth of taxes. I failed to order paper, and was shocked to see how expensive it was in the store. So, order the paper while you are at it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the same model I have had for over 20 years and loved. The old one still worked but was fussy about printing and because I do accounting I need it to print out sometimes. I love the touch of this machine and when I saw they were still available I decided to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky in Kona

customer_reviews.title: it's great.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bookkeeper for over 28 years and was so used to the Sharp calculator at work, I had trouble using the cheap little one I had at home. This one is almost the exact same model and I love it. So, el-cheapo goes to the second hand store!
customer_reviews.author: JAYBEE

customer_reviews.title: I already have one exactly like this. I thought I needed a new one ...
customer_reviews.text: I already have one exactly like this. I thought I needed a new one after I spilled a glass of water on it but after a couple of days drying out mine came back to life. I returned the one I purchased but only because mine (this exact model) came back to life. Its a great adding machine -- really like the key layout.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky S

customer_reviews.title: Sharp EL-1801V Printing Calculator
customer_reviews.text: This calculator is easy to use! Had a Sharp for years (the smaller size model) When it was time to replace I purchased the larger model. Of course uses Black/Red ink. I can always count on checking with Amazon first when looking for a product
customer_reviews.author: Personal Concierge

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband to use at work. Great for his bigger fingers. Only complaint - they sent the smallest roll of paper with it. For the price, they should sent at least one regular roll of printing paper.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this adding machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an 40 yr old adding machine. This is the perfect size and easy to get use to key placement.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Lou

customer_reviews.title: Printing takes forever
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why it's like this, but the printing takes forever (if you remember daisy wheels ... ). You have to wait for it to type out each sum. I hate it. Unfortunately missed the return window or I would return this for another brand. I do like the size and otherwise feels/looks good, but the printing thing will drive me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: ncstorace

customer_reviews.title: The cord is a little shorter than my last calculator.
customer_reviews.text: This product replaces a sharp calculator that I had for over 30 years. The layout is a little different but it has basically all of the same functions I am used to. This is the perfect size. It did arrive with a dinky paper roll that would last about 10 minutes but I don't use the tape so no worries here. Appears to be the same quality as my last one.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's suppossed to do!
customer_reviews.text: I've had several Sharp calculators over the years, and they've all performed well, but eventually they do wear out. When that happens, I have to replace it. The EL-1801V does what I want it to do with no problems. I haven't had to replace the small ink cartridge yet, so I can't say how often those might need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Golfjim175

customer_reviews.title: number input response time is too annoying
customer_reviews.text: After you input each number, there is a machine gun sound. It is kind of like an old typewriter with a return. It may be able to handle the fast input of many numbers, but the delay is too much for everyday bookkeeping. It may be fine for balancing your personal checkbook, but not for +- large groups of numbers.
customer_reviews.author: jande

customer_reviews.title: Worst Calculator I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this calculator October 22, 2018. On May 23, 2019 it went off and will not come back on. The last Sharp I owned lasted me over 20 years. That is the only reason that I purchased this one. I will do a little more research before I purchase another one. I went on the Amazon return and there isn't an option to return it or even exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Theus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today replacing my TI-5045 SV which served me faithfully for almost 40 years. Very much pleased that it is straight 120V without a power brick to awkwardly sit on my power strip taking up space needed for other items. The keyboard is almost identical to the Texas Instruments which was a pleasant surprise. Perfect size and functions for home and small business use. If it stands the test of time, I will have made a very wise choice.
customer_reviews.author: W. on OBXNC

customer_reviews.title: This calculator is junk
customer_reviews.text: I have had the calculator for almost a year and have used it for a total of maybe one hour. The calculator has always stayed on a desk downstairs and used for our small business. It has not been dropped or abused in any way. I went to use it tonight and it wont even come on. My husband messed with it a bit and it finally turned on but the screen does not work. I paid way to much money for this calculator for it to have already crapped out on me :( I will not be buying another Sharp.
customer_reviews.author: JenJen

customer_reviews.title: read  manual with a telescope
customer_reviews.text: I am learning via YouTube Because strokes took all my math section of my brain, I need an adding with paper. I'm certain this will be just the right solution for me
customer_reviews.author: VJH-W

customer_reviews.title: One year life span
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Ausust 10, 2016, in September 2017 it started humming and would not work. Lasted only one year! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Read
customer_reviews.text: I had to return mine as the numeral two kept sticking and would enter multiple with just the slightest touch. Since I had to have a calculator immediately, I did not order a replacement. Too bad I got a lemon as I really liked its features.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Bad keyboard layout.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 2 sharp's over 30 years and loved them. This one is a disappointment. Keyboard is reversed and I can no longer use it without searching for the functions. Used to be able to use it without looking at the keys like any good accountant can.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this calculator
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this calculator. I can read the screen without having to raise the calculator. (the old one I had a brick under it so I could see the screen) There is no glare. Its not huge and doesn't take up a ton on room from my already grounded desk. VERY happy it is not a ribbon calculator. They dry out to quickly and do not last like the little ink cartridge this calculator uses. Great little machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jean

customer_reviews.title: Nice battery operated calculator
customer_reviews.text: Nice for a more portable 10 key option. It works strictly on batteries. It would be nice if it had an option to plug it in, should the batteries run low or you want to save on them.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Calculator
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how many revisions this family of calculators has been through but it keeps getting better (easy to read LED instead of the old LCD) at a reasonable price. For those who still know how to use one, they're hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: HH Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not a Royal
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my Royal which was great. Took sometime to get use to but works good. Have had not problems with it. Arrived on time & without any shipping problems.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for home office
customer_reviews.text: This calculator is ideal for my home office. One of the features I really like is it can be plugged in or it can be battery operated.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure there's any calculator out there that's truly quiet. This one doesn't put out nearly as much noise as my old one. It's actually pleasant if I say so myself. Keying is not loud, printing is very tolerable. It makes me feel like I'm doing some big time adding(smile).
customer_reviews.author: Tamika Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone with sight problems
customer_reviews.text: Love this calculator/adding machine. I have double vision and macular degeneration, The Sharp EL-1801V is easy to read . Recommend for anyone with eye problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great machine but....
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine for all of it's features, I just don't like the huge keys. The key size is uncomfortable & I have to hunt & peck because they're so big. It would be perfect if it had regular size keys, while keeping the large print.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive household calculator that does the job and more!
customer_reviews.text: For a relatively low price this calculator can meet your everyday needs. With features such as average, cost, sell, margin, and memory it goes will beyond the ordinary. I always use Sharp and this calculator is another reason why I always will.
customer_reviews.author: Phranquie Coull

customer_reviews.title: Okay Printer
customer_reviews.text: The Sharp EL-1801V calculator is an okay printer. I was used to a different model that was larger and faster. I keep the printing off most of the time because it doesn't print as fast as I am inputting the numbers so is very irritating. I will work with it a while until I can afford to purchase the model like I had previously. The calculator works just fine but is much smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: What a calculator
customer_reviews.text: this was a replacement machine for a TI one I have had for probably 20 years --- this Sharp machine is terrific and I would recommended it easily for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: honeyluv

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: My old sharp adding machine stopped working so I replaced it with this model. I wanted more compacted model and this fit the bill. Am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pearline Franco

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: These sorts of machines are likely becoming old school, what with all of the accounting applications out there. Using office parlance, this printing calculator can be seen as subsidiary. At the end of the day, preference rules the day. Some people may prefer Old School.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Frost

customer_reviews.title: Sharp EL-1801V  calculator
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I've been looking for. The buttons do not float. I repeat, they do not float. When you push a button, you know you pushed it. My old calculator was a Canon. Hated it bunches!! On the Canon, when you hit a button, it like, rocks, and you could hit the button next to it. So you have to stop and look to make sure the number you wanted was the one entered. Not so with the Sharp EL 1801V. Are all Sharps like this one? Don't know, but this one, to me, is the bomb.
customer_reviews.author: H. Decker

customer_reviews.title: Great Adding Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great adding machine. The only thing missing is the date on the paper receipt, but that is not that big of a deal. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Traditional Keypad Layout
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Set up closer to traditional calculators of 20 years ago. It's a little noisy but I only use it for home: statement reconciliation, taxes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: meper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for calculating Business Income & Expenses!
customer_reviews.text: My auntie had this calculator while I was a kid (1980's), I use to play with it all the time LoL. So, I was excited to order this! It's helped me tremendously with my taxes & business income. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissandra Snider

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the led numbers. They are very easy to read. My only complaint is that the memory doesn’t “stick” when you turn off the calculator like my old one did.
customer_reviews.author: Duanebear

customer_reviews.title: great calculator
customer_reviews.text: Has all that I needed. all math functions, and colored tape for review. would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Ok for casual use
customer_reviews.text: For me this machine is not user friendly if you need to crunch a lot of numbers at one time. The machine is small and there is not enough space between the 0 and C keys.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. M

customer_reviews.title: Sleek styling, works great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s taken me years to break down and replace my old desk calculator, but once I did, I kick myself for not purchasing this calculator sooner and saving myself a lot of tension. This is nice, sleek, and works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: seaside77

customer_reviews.title: Is it a roller or ribbon calculator
customer_reviews.text: for a roller ink it printed very clear easy to read numbers. I prefer a ribbon printer but the info on most of the calculators did not state roller ink or ribbon. I'm happy with the roller now, but hopefully as the roller gets used, the numbers will not print smudged.
customer_reviews.author: mstarr

customer_reviews.title: Good but noisy
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this calculator is that it takes so long to print each line of numbers and is noisy when doing so. Other than that it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This calculator is just what I wanted. The price is good and the product is perfect. Makes my life a lot more productive.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: I have rolls of toilet paper- I need A roll of Calculator Tape!
customer_reviews.text: Real on the job old school sturdy calculator. Bought it because it had a tape . Thing is the Roll of tape they give you is barely a couple of yards long! So you are trying to dig deep into a project and then you run out of tape in the first half hour! Then you have to buy a huge pack of it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Big Buttons and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great adding machine. Easy to use and of course BIG BUTTONS. Makes it easier to do 10-key by touch.
customer_reviews.author: Cherbe

customer_reviews.title: I loved this adding machine and then one day
customer_reviews.text: I loved this adding machine and then one day, it just stopped working 3 months later. I used it about 3 or 4 times a week for a few hours and then I plugged it in, and nothing. I plugged it into another plug and it worked for a minute and then stopped and never came back on. I have no clue why it just died, but it did. Too bad. I ordered another maker after that.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Ari

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep records on four check books and two savings accounts. I am crunching numbers constantly. The adding machine has made such a big difference in my life.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: This is a great calculator. It arrived in a timely manner and is perfect for me. Thanks for such good service.
customer_reviews.author: N. Crump

customer_reviews.title: It saved the day!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how fast I received this. My old one like this had broke in a middle of doing a clients yearly account for for tax purposes and I order this and received it the next day. What a blessing. I like the updated one I received. This was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Great desk model
customer_reviews.text: What can you say! A calculator is a calculator. Good for home or office use.
customer_reviews.author: Ex A F Pilot

customer_reviews.title: The digital read out is perfect anywhere I sit this machine on my desk
customer_reviews.text: Oh my FINALLY I can SEE/READ the amounts! The digital read out is perfect anywhere I sit this machine on my desk. The old ones were difficult to see I had to move them around so light or glare or anything else wasn't disrupting my reading! I LOVE THIS MACHINE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this if you use a calculator a lot
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hated it and returned it. It is slow and a clunker. Only used it a day before we bought something else
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Myers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Had one like this at work and it finally quit working. This is merely a replacement for what I had as it is an easy calculator for myself and my CPA
customer_reviews.author: J. Driggs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel heavy duty but does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does not feel like a heavy duty unit. I have been using it for couple of months and I find to work which is all I ask for. The keys all work the same (I have had calculators were different keys need a different amount of pressure). Speed is ok, not super fast but not so slow as you have to wait to type in numbers. OK for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Router user

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: As a retired accountant I have used a few of these. Its great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Anthony s

customer_reviews.title: Works fine!
customer_reviews.text: I recently became the treasurer for our church and the job was taking a good bit more time than I had expected (mostly because my old machine had quit printing a tape so I had to add columns multiple times to be sure I had done it correctly). I looked at several adding machines before buying this one.The price was persuasive and it listed the features I needed. I have had it for several months now with no problems at all. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Good calculator for the home
customer_reviews.text: This is a good calculator for the home or light office use. I have used the Sharp EL-1197PIII daily at the office for many years & have had no problems. The EL-1801-V is not as heavy duty but is still very adequate for most bookkeeping chores when a spreadsheet is not practical. Note: the "total" key is on the right side instead of on the left as on the 1197 so that takes a little getting used to. I highly recommend this calculator if you're not interested in the heavy duty model.
customer_reviews.author: L Damon

customer_reviews.title: It was really slow. Typing the keys and having ...
customer_reviews.text: It was really slow. Typing the keys and having to wait for it to catch up was frustrating. Guess I'm a bit impatient.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Awfully Noisy
customer_reviews.text: The calculators print function is abnormally loud. I'd prefer an all at once stamp rather than all the different numbers individually being typed out.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Organ

customer_reviews.title: simple to use
customer_reviews.text: This replaced the exact model which was 30 yes old
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Tolomeo

customer_reviews.title: Super loud when printing
customer_reviews.text: If you never use the adding machine tape, this calculator is fine. But if you print a lot, it is super loud and annoying, about 3 times louder than the Canon adding machines in our office. It annoyed the staff in our accounting office so much that I had to stop using it, and bought a Canon.
customer_reviews.author: B. Boehler

customer_reviews.title: Nice calculator.
customer_reviews.text: This calculator works as promised. It came within 2 days also.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Bright screen good size and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great calculator, screen is bright and easy to read. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Poythress

customer_reviews.title: ood product but slower printing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Sharp calculator to replace 10 year old previous Sharp. Similar key board and a bit smaller so works well. However the new printer is very slow, instead of printing the whole number at once it only prints one number at a time from right to left. if you use big numbers you end up waiting for the printer to catch up with you.
customer_reviews.author: SEW

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with but small roll of paper but good producy
customer_reviews.author: Letitia  Smith Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Matched up model
customer_reviews.text: Old one died after only 20 plus years of working. Forgot to check and see if any warranty help was available. LoL. Received new unit in timely manner at great price. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: larry briley

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I use this product almost daily at home and it's so nice to have the convenience. The ink faded pretty quickly though. Haven't replaced it yet because just on principle I thought it should have lasted more than 3 months. I really use it every two weeks to pay bills.
customer_reviews.author: Fagel56

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I will not be using all the functions on this calculator, but it is exactly what I was looking for and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Have used different brands in the past. This Sharp is by far the best. My husband needed a new calculator so I gave him mine and ordered the same one back for me. Win - win!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Golden

customer_reviews.title: Nice little calc
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wrong one. Oh well, this works for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C

customer_reviews.title: Printing calculator that doesn't come with at least half a roll of paper????
customer_reviews.text: Usually, when I order a printing calculator, it comes with at least half a roll of tape! If I'd of known this one didn't, I would have ordered paper tape at the time. Being stores are mostly closed for COVID19 the lack of paper tape made this very inconvenient
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long time
customer_reviews.text: I have worn out two of these, does that let you know how much I like them. They are easy to use and last a very long time. The ink can be replaced so you never run out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandywavshi

product_meta.title: Sharp EL-1801V Two-Color Printing Calculator 2.1 Lines/Sec 4" Black/Red
product_meta.description: Size:7.6 x 10.1 x 2.5 inches12 digit calculator is perfect for the occasional user, especially in a small office or home office setting. Features an extra large fluorescent display for easy viewing. You can count on the fast and reliable 2.5 lines-per-second ink printer. Professional keyboard layout with one-touch change calculation to display and print the change owed. Cost-sell-margin keys make for quick and easy profit margin calculations.
feature_bullets: Cost/Sell/Margin keys, Grand Total and Average
Uses replaceable Victor ink roller IR40T

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,240 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
